configOption.fuelinfo.showFuelData.desc: Whether or not fuel data should be displayed here.
configOption.fuelinfo.showTimer.desc: Whether or not a timer should be displayed here.
configGroup.fuelinfo.flame.desc: Customize which elements should be displayed when hovering a Furnace's flame.
configGroup.fuelinfo.gauge.desc: Customize which elements should be displayed when hovering a Brewing Stand's fuel gauge.
configGroup.fuelinfo.progress_arrow.desc: Customize which elements should be displayed when hovering a progress arrow.
modmenu.summaryTranslation.fuelinfo: Adds additional information for the furnace and brewing stand.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.fuelinfo: Adds additional information for the furnace and brewing stand, such as how many items can be processed or how long it takes to process all items.
